title: TravelTide
description: TravelTide is a travel app that curates personalized itineraries based on seasonal trends and user reviews.
introduction: TravelTide is an innovative travel app designed to revolutionize the way we plan our trips. By focusing on seasonal trends and real user reviews, TravelTide offers users tailored itineraries that enhance their travel experiences, making every journey unique and memorable.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The idea for TravelTide stemmed from the frustration of using generic travel recommendations that didn't cater to individual preferences or current trends. We wanted to create an app that would offer more personalized and timely travel suggestions, enhancing the overall travel planning experience.

sections.title: Prototype
sections.body: We developed the initial prototype using React Native for a cross-platform approach, allowing us to test on both iOS and Android. Firebase was chosen for the backend to handle real-time data and user authentication. Challenges included ensuring seamless integration of seasonal data and user reviews into the itinerary generation algorithm.

sections.title: Initial Stages
sections.body: In the early stages, we focused on gathering user feedback to refine our algorithm. We integrated seasonal data from various sources and aggregated user reviews to create a more dynamic and personalized itinerary. This phase involved significant data cleaning and algorithm tweaking to ensure accurate recommendations.

sections.title: Current Features
sections.body: TravelTide currently offers real-time trend analysis, comprehensive review aggregation, and customizable itinerary options. Users can explore destinations based on popularity during specific seasons and receive recommendations that align with their interests. The app also includes a social feature where users can share their travel experiences.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.body: Looking ahead, we plan to integrate more advanced personalization using AI to predict user preferences better. Expanding our database to include more destinations and partnering with travel agencies for direct booking capabilities are also on the horizon. Enhancing the app's social features to foster a community of travelers is another key focus.
